metadata.name: The first part
metadata.description: Part 1: Marya was a graphics student. A girl with long hair who wears prescription glasses and sneakers. She loves painting, fish and the sea, flowers and trees. She is a very energetic girl. Her interests are drawn in the picture: sneakers, fish And rain and sea, apples and plants. Brushes sticking out of a cloud tell her love for painting.She saw life as very simple and beautiful.
